items.name: Amendment_Title
items.label: عنوان الحاقيه
items.sql:
SELECT Contract_Title
FROM PMT_TB110001
WHERE IsDelete = 0 and IsActive = 1 and Contract_Code = "@#Contract_Amendment_Selector"

items.name: Contract_Duration
items.label: مدت نهايي [روز]
items.validateMessage:
تعداد روز بايستي كمتر از 10 هزار روز باشد . 
فقط ورود عدد مجاز است !

items.name: Contract_Duration_Latest
items.label: مدت بر اساس آخرين تغييرات [روز]
items.sql:
SELECT Contract_Duration
FROM PMT_TB110001
WHERE IsDelete = 0 and IsActive = 1 and Contract_Code = "@#Amendment_Code"

columns.name: Amount_Value
columns.label: مبلغ
columns.placeholder: عددي كمتر از 15 رقم وارد كنيد
columns.title: مبلغ

items.name: Subject_Show
items.label: موضوعات كاري بر اساس آخرين تغييرات
items.title: موضوعات كاري بر اساس آخرين تغييرات

columns.name: Subject_Code
columns.label: انتخاب موضوع
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'موضوع قرارداد را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Subject_Code, CONCAT (Subject_Code," || ",Subject_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'
 and Subject_Title LIKE "%@#Subject_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب موضوع

columns.name: Subject_Title
columns.label: عنوان موضوع
columns.sql:
SELECT Subject_Title
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0001'
 and Subject_Code = "@#Subject_Code"
columns.title: عنوان موضوع

items.name: Projects_Show
items.label: پروژه‌هاي مرتبط بر اساس آخرين تغييرات

columns.name: Project_ID_Detector
columns.label: پيدا كننده رديف
columns.sql:
select ID
from PMT_TB120018
where IsDelete = 0
 and IsActive = 1
 and Contract_Code = '@#Contract_Project_Code'
 and Contract_Project_Rank = '@#Contract_Project_Rank_Show'
columns.title: پيدا كننده رديف

items.title: پروژه‌هاي مرتبط بر اساس آخرين تغييرات

columns.name: Project_Code
columns.label: انتخاب پروژه
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'موضوع قرارداد را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Project_Code, CONCAT (Project_Code," || ",Project_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110002
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Project_Title LIKE "%@#Project_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب پروژه

columns.name: Project_Title
columns.label: عنوان پروژه
columns.sql:
SELECT Project_Title
FROM PMT_TB110002
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Project_Code = "@#Project_Code"
columns.title: عنوان پروژه

columns.name: Location_ID_Detector
columns.label: پيدا كننده رديف
columns.sql:
select ID
from PMT_TB120021
where IsDelete = 0
 and IsActive = 1
 and Contract_Code = '@#Contract_Location_Code'

columns.name: Location_Code
columns.label: انتخاب محل فعاليت
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'محل فعاليت را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Location_Code, CONCAT (Location_Code," || ",Location_Title)
FROM PMT_TB100004
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Location_Title LIKE "%@#Location_Search%"
columns.title: انتخاب محل فعاليت

columns.name: Location_Title
columns.label: عنوان محل فعاليت
columns.sql:
SELECT Location_Title
FROM PMT_TB100004
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Location_Code = "@#Location_Code"
columns.title: عنوان محل فعاليت
